id: MashableDeals on 4K TVs this week: Save on Sony, LG, Sharp, Samsung, and more
paragraph:
If you're looking for a new TV but are feeling overwhelmed by all the options, then it's time to relax. We did all the hard work for you and gathered together the best deals from Amazon, Walmart, and Best Buy. There are a lot of high quality and high performing models from top manufacturers like Sony, LG Electronics, Samsung, and more on sale.Kicking things off, Amazon has the Samsung Flat 40-inch 4K UHD 7 Series Smart TV on sale for $377.99, or $102 off its retail price, while Walmart has RCA's 43-inch Class 4K Ultra HD LED TV going for the low price of $199.99. These models are perfect for a bedroom or a guest room in your home.For something a little bit bigger, LG Electronics' 55-inch 4K Ultra HD Smart LED TV is priced at $496.99, while JVC's 55-inch Class 4K Ultra HD HDR Smart LED TV is going for $319.99. This model has a built-in Chromecast, so you can watch Netflix, Amazon Prime Video, and Hulu Plus from your smartphone and "throw it" to your brand new 4K TV with ease.SEE ALSO: Save almost $100 on Xbox One S and Xbox One X bundles, on sale at WalmartFinally, Sony's XBR75X940E 75-Inch 4K Ultra HD Smart LED TV is priced at $2,798.00, which is a whopping $3,200 off, while LG's 86-inch Class 4K HDR Smart LED UHD TV with AI ThinQ technology is on sale for $2,496.99, or $2,003 off its retail price.
